Heads up! QA for the next ballot release is starting soon (March 4) and we'll be offering the extremely valuable opportunity to participate in this 'once in a lifetime' event! We'll send out a notification when we have more details about the process, but if you're interested, then drop me a line at - david.hay25 at gmail.com

Also looking for any experts in word macros who would be willing to help us with ballot prep materials (we currently generate the documents for review by using word macros)

(I may have slightly overstated the excitement :) )
